title: Font used on T shirt
content:
A new T shirt line has just been released over here, so I was wondering if anybody knows what fonts are the ones they used?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019174906/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_42.JPG) | 146.49 KB |
author: Vesp

comments.content:
Thanks, helped me a lot!  
I also managed to discover that the first row is in Clarendon.But I still can't find what font does the "&" use. Any ideas?
looks like Cloister Black to me.
